name: Twilight Gambit Combat Demo
description:
Twilight Gambit is a 2D Turn-based RPG game centered around deck building, cards, and risk versus reward mechanics. It focuses on Kai: a kid who was thrust from his home world, after he eats the fruits bore from a giant tree that sprung up overnight. Help Kai find his neighbor and friend, Faye, and a way to return to their home world, by traversing the magical land of E'Lea. 

Remember, strategy is the name of the game. You wont go far unless you take some risks!

When you finish the demo please take the time to complete this form for feedback!

Feel free to join the Gamechee Discord for updates and a fun time with the community!

If you want to donate to the cause, please use the donation feature on itch.io when downloading the game, or subscribe to our Patreon page! Thank You!
